AutoResetGuildTimeNoOnlinePlayers:
Default: 72(h)
Time to automatically remove players from the guild when they are offline
bActiveUNKO:
Default: False
Toggle the mysterious UNKO event (True/False)
BaseCampWorkerMaxNum: Maximum number of working Pal in the base
bAutoResetGuildNoOnlinePlayers:
Default: False
Automatically remove players from the guild (True/False)
bCanPickupOtherGuildDeathPenaltyDrop:
Default: False
[Recommended for PVP] Can pick up death penalty drops from other guilds (True/False)
bEnableAimAssistKeyboard:
Default: False
Mouse and keyboard-assisted aiming (True/False)
bEnableDefenseOtherGuildPlayer:
Default: False
[Recommended for PVP] Can be damaged by players from other guilds (True/False)
bEnableFriendlyFire:
Default: False
[Recommended for PVP] Player's damage to their own Pal and guild members (True/False)
bEnableNonLoginPenalty:
Default: False
[Recommended for PVP] Login penalty (True/False) [Unknown purpose]
bEnablePlayerToPlayerDamage:
Default: False
[Recommended for PVP] Player-to-player damage (True/False)
bExistPlayerAfterLogout:
Default: False
Automatically shut down the server when all players log out (True/False)
bIsPvP:
Default: False
[Recommended for PVP] Multiplayer and PVP mode (True/False)
bIsStartLocationSelectByMap:
Default: True
Select starting point after character creation (True/False)
PS: If turned off, spawn in the initial area. After death, you can still choose other spawn points
bUseAuth:
Use authorization (purpose unknown)
PS: Probably a service for official verification
CollectionDropRate:
Default: 1
Resource drop rate
Example: Hit a small Palu ore with a stone draft to get 1 Palu shard, default is 6 hits averaging 19 damage. If set to 3, it takes 2 hits averaging 19 damage.
CollectionObjectHpRate:
Default: 1
Resource collection health multiplier (0.5 - 3)
PS: Tested ineffective after hitting a small Palu ore
CollectionObjectRespawnSpeedRate:
Default: 1
Resource collection respawn interval (0; 0.5 - 3)
PS: Trees and large ores respawn in 1 hour, immediate respawn if set to 0
DeathPenalty:
Death penalty
None: Nothing drops
Item: Only items drop (excluding Palu and equipped weapons and equipment)
ItemAndEquipment: Everything except Palu drops
All: Palu, equipment, and items all drop (excluding Palu-specific equipment that cannot be dropped, such as saddles)
Difficulty:
Default: None
Even if Difficult or Easy is used, it does not affect the following parameter adjustments
DropItemAliveMaxHours:
Default: 1(h)
Retention time of dropped items
PS: It is recommended to set it to 0.5 to ensure that dropped items do not accumulate and cause lag
DropItemMaxNum: Maximum number of dropped items in the world
DropItemMaxNum_UNKO: Maximum number of dropped items for mysterious UNKO
PalAutoHPRegeneRate:
Default: 1
Palu's automatic health regeneration rate
PalAutoHpRegeneRateInSleep:
Default: 1
Palu's health regeneration multiplier during sleep (in the Palu box)
PalCaptureRate:
Default: 1
Palu capture probability (0.5 - 2)
PS: This parameter is very sensitive, adjust with caution. Difficult mode is 0.8, easy mode is 2
PalDamageRateAttack:
Default: 1
Damage multiplier caused by Palu
PalDamageRateDefense:
Default: 1
Damage multiplier received by Palu
PalEggDefaultHatchingTime:
Default: 1(h)
Hatching time for giant eggs
PalSpawnNumRate:
Default: 1
Palu respawn quantity
If set to 2, kings will always be 2, and wild Palu groups will be 2-4
PS: Exceeding 3 will often cause Palu overlap or fall out of the map, so adjust with caution
PalStaminaDecreaseRate:
Default: 1
Palu's stamina bar decrease rate (0.1 - 5)
PlayerAutoHPRegeneRate:
Default: 1
Player's automatic health regeneration rate
PlayerAutoHpRegeneRateInSleep:
Default: 1
Player's health regeneration multiplier during sleep
PlayerDamageRateAttack:
Default: 1
Damage multiplier caused by the player (0.1 - 5)
PlayerDamageRateDefense:
Default: 1
Damage multiplier received by the player (0.1 - 5)
PlayerStaminaDecreaseRate:
Default: 1
Player's stamina bar decrease rate (0.1 - 5)
Region: Region (currently unknown, may be country-based in the future)
ServerPassword: Server password (awaiting official durability repair update)
ServerPlayerMaxNum: Maximum number of players on the server
